import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useMemo, useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext.jsx'; export default function Sidebar({ expanded, onToggle }) { const { user } = useAuth(); const isAdmin = user?.rol === 'admin'; const [localExpanded, setLocalExpanded] = useState(expanded ?? true); const toggle = () => { const next = !localExpanded; setLocalExpanded(next); onToggle?.(next); }; const isExpanded = expanded ?? localExpanded; return (
`nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Dashboard `nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Productos `nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Categoras `nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Proveedores `nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Movimientos `nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Alertas `nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Reportes `nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Auditoras
Configuracin
`nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> General {isAdmin ? ( <> `nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Campos dinmicos `nav-link ${isActive ? 'active' : ''}`}> Importacin / Exportacin ) : null}
); }

suppressedMessages.message: React Hook useEffect has missing dependencies: 'debounce', 'defaultValue', 'enableGlobal', 'globalSearch', 'globalType', 'onSearch', and 'triggerSearch'. Either include them or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [debounce, defaultValue, enableGlobal, globalSearch, globalType, onSearch, triggerSearch]

fix.text: [debounce, defaultValue, enableGlobal, globalSearch, globalType, onSearch, triggerSearch]

Remove unused variable 'searchKey'.

messages.message: The 'renderSortLabel' function makes the dependencies of useMemo Hook (at line 219) change on every render. Move it inside the useMemo callback. Alternatively, wrap the definition of 'renderSortLabel' in its own useCallback() Hook.

React Hook useMemo has missing dependencies: 'editingId' and 'onEdit'. Either include them or remove the dependency array. If 'onEdit' changes too often, find the parent component that defines it and wrap that definition in useCallback.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [editingId, deletingId, onEdit, onRequestDelete]

messages.message: Fast refresh only works when a file only exports components. Use a new file to share constants or functions between components.
Fast refresh only works when a file only exports components. Use a new file to share constants or functions between components.
React Hook "useQueryClient" is called conditionally. React Hooks must be called in the exact same order in every component render.
React Hook useMemo has unnecessary dependencies: 'registroId' and 'tabla'. Either exclude them or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [params]

messages.message: React Hook useMemo has a missing dependency: 'keys'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [keys]

messages.message: React Hook useMemo has a complex expression in the dependency array. Extract it to a separate variable so it can be statically checked.
The 'tree' logical expression could make the dependencies of useMemo Hook (at line 87) change on every render. To fix this, wrap the initialization of 'tree' in its own useMemo() Hook.
The 'totals' logical expression could make the dependencies of useMemo Hook (at line 177) change on every render. To fix this, wrap the initialization of 'totals' in its own useMemo() Hook.
The 'movements' logical expression could make the dependencies of useMemo Hook (at line 149) change on every render. To fix this, wrap the initialization of 'movements' in its own useMemo() Hook.
The 'movements' logical expression could make the dependencies of useMemo Hook (at line 180) change on every render. To fix this, wrap the initialization of 'movements' in its own useMemo() Hook.

source:
import { useMemo } from 'react' import { useDashboardSummary } from '../hooks/useDashboardSummary.js' import LoadingSpinner from '../components/LoadingSpinner.jsx' import { Line } from 'react-chartjs-2' import { Chart as ChartJS, CategoryScale, LinearScale, PointElement, LineElement, Tooltip, Legend, Filler, } from 'chart.js' ChartJS.register(CategoryScale, LinearScale, PointElement, LineElement, Tooltip, Legend, Filler) const palette = { pageBg: '#f5f7f2', headerGradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #1f3021, #2e4d2b)', highlightGradient: 'linear-gradient(140deg, #2a9d8f, #264653)', card: '#ffffff', subtleCard: '#f0f4ec', textPrimary: '#1f2933', textSecondary: '#475467', accent: '#2a9d8f', accentWarning: '#d97706', } const formatNumber = (value) => { if (value === null || value === undefined || Number.isNaN(Number(value))) return '' return new Intl.NumberFormat('es-AR').format(Number(value)) } const formatDateTime = (value) => { if (!value) return '' try { return new Date(value).toLocaleString('es-AR', { dateStyle: 'short', timeStyle: 'short', }) } catch (_) { return '' } } export default function DashboardPreview() { const { data, isLoading, isError, error } = useDashboardSummary() const totals = data?.totals ?? {} const lowStock = data?.lowStock ?? { items: [] } const movements = data?.recentMovements ?? [] const stockTrendData = useMemo(() => { const topItems = lowStock.items.slice(0, 6) if (!topItems.length) { return { labels: ['Sin datos'], datasets: [ { label: 'Stock actual', data: [0], borderColor: palette.accent, backgroundColor: 'rgba(42, 157, 143, 0.12)', tension: 0.4, fill: true, pointRadius: 0, }, ], } } return { labels: topItems.map((item) => item.nombre || `Producto ${item.id}`), datasets: [ { label: 'Stock actual', data: topItems.map((item) => Number(item.stock_actual ?? 0)), borderColor: palette.accent, backgroundColor: 'rgba(42, 157, 143, 0.14)', tension: 0.45, fill: true, pointBackgroundColor: '#fff', pointBorderColor: palette.accent, pointBorderWidth: 2, pointRadius: 5, }, { label: 'Stock mnimo', data: topItems.map((item) => Number(item.stock_minimo ?? 0)), borderColor: palette.accentWarning, backgroundColor: 'rgba(217, 119, 6, 0.14)', tension: 0.45, fill: true, pointBackgroundColor: '#fff', pointBorderColor: palette.accentWarning, pointBorderWidth: 2, pointRadius: 5, }, ], } }, [lowStock.items]) const stockTrendOptions = useMemo( () => ({ responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, plugins: { legend: { position: 'top', labels: { color: '#475467', font: { family: '"Inter", "Segoe UI", sans-serif', size: 12 }, usePointStyle: true, boxWidth: 10, }, }, tooltip: { mode: 'index', intersect: false }, }, interaction: { mode: 'index', intersect: false }, scales: { x: { ticks: { color: '#64748b', maxRotation: 25, minRotation: 25 }, grid: { display: false }, }, y: { beginAtZero: true, ticks: { color: '#64748b' }, grid: { color: 'rgba(148, 163, 184, 0.25)' }, }, }, }), [] ) const movementSummary = useMemo( () => movements.reduce( (acc, mov) => { const amount = Number(mov.cantidad ?? 0) if (mov.tipo === 'entrada') acc.entrada += amount else if (mov.tipo === 'salida') acc.salida += amount else acc.otros += amount return acc }, { entrada: 0, salida: 0, otros: 0 } ), [movements] ) const activeProductPct = useMemo(() => { const total = Number(totals.productos ?? 0) if (!total) return null const activos = Number(totals.productos_activos ?? 0) return Math.min(100, Math.round((activos / total) * 100)) }, [totals.productos, totals.productos_activos]) const highlightCards = useMemo( () => [ { title: 'Categoras activas', value: formatNumber(totals.categorias ?? null), detail: `${formatNumber(totals.categorias_principales ?? null)} principales`, }, { title: 'Proveedores vinculados', value: formatNumber(totals.proveedores ?? null), detail: `${formatNumber(totals.proveedores_activos ?? null)} activos`, }, { title: 'Movimientos (30 das)', value: formatNumber(totals.movimientos_30d ?? null), detail: `${formatNumber(movements.length)} recientes visibles`, }, ], [totals, movements.length] ) const movementPreview = useMemo(() => movements.slice(0, 5), [movements]) return (
Inventarios ASD

Error al cargar datos: {error?.message ?? 'desconocido'}
)} {!isLoading && !isError && (

Stock actual versus mnimo configurado en los productos con alertas.

{highlightCards.map((card) => (
{card.title}
{card.value}

{card.detail}

))}

Salud del inventario

{activeProductPct === null ? '' : `${activeProductPct}%`} activos

{activeProductPct === null ? 'No hay datos suficientes para calcular la proporcin de productos activos.' : `Actualmente, ${formatNumber(totals.productos_activos ?? null)} de ${formatNumber( totals.productos ?? null )} productos estn disponibles.`}

)}
) } function SummaryRow({ label, value, color, helper }) { return (

{helper}
) }

messages.message: The 'movements' logical expression could make the dependencies of useMemo Hook (at line 102) change on every render. Move it inside the useMemo callback. Alternatively, wrap the initialization of 'movements' in its own useMemo() Hook.

source:
import { useMemo } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDashboardSummary } from '../hooks/useDashboardSummary.js' import LoadingSpinner from '../components/LoadingSpinner.jsx' const palette = { pageBg: '#f5f7f2', sidebarBg: '#101f15', sidebarAccent: '#1b3524', accent: '#2a9d8f', accentSoft: 'rgba(42, 157, 143, 0.12)', textPrimary: '#1f2933', textSecondary: '#475467', card: '#ffffff', tableHeader: '#e7f0e8', } const periodDays = 30 const calcNetRatio = (entries, exits) => { const net = entries - exits const ratio = periodDays > 0 ? net / periodDays : 0 return { net, ratio } } const formatNumber = (value) => { if (value === null || value === undefined || Number.isNaN(Number(value))) return '' return new Intl.NumberFormat('es-AR', { maximumFractionDigits: 2 }).format(Number(value)) } export default function DashboardPreviewABC() { const { data, isLoading, isError, error } = useDashboardSummary() const movements = data?.recentMovements ?? [] const stats = useMemo(() => { const grouped = new Map() let totalEntries = 0 let totalExits = 0 movements.forEach((mov) => { const id = mov.producto_id ?? mov.id const entry = grouped.get(id) ?? { productId: id, productName: mov.producto_nombre ?? `Producto ${id}`, frequency: 0, totalQty: 0, entradas: 0, salidas: 0, } entry.frequency += 1 const qty = Number(mov.cantidad ?? 0) entry.totalQty += qty if (mov.tipo === 'entrada') { entry.entradas += qty totalEntries += qty } else if (mov.tipo === 'salida') { entry.salidas += qty totalExits += qty } grouped.set(id, entry) }) const items = Array.from(grouped.values()) const totalMovements = items.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.frequency, 0) const sorted = items.sort((a, b) => b.frequency - a.frequency) let cumulative = 0 const annotated = sorted.map((item) => { cumulative += item.frequency const cumulativePct = totalMovements > 0 ? (cumulative / totalMovements) * 100 : 0 let bucket = 'C' if (cumulativePct <= 80) bucket = 'A' else if (cumulativePct <= 95) bucket = 'B' return { ...item, bucket, cumulativePct } }) const bucketMap = annotated.reduce( (acc, item) => { acc[item.bucket].count += 1 acc[item.bucket].movements += item.frequency return acc }, { A: { count: 0, movements: 0 }, B: { count: 0, movements: 0 }, C: { count: 0, movements: 0 } } ) const { net, ratio } = calcNetRatio(totalEntries, totalExits) return { annotated, bucketMap, totals: { products: annotated.length, movements: totalMovements, entradas: totalEntries, salidas: totalExits, net, ratio, }, } }, [movements]) return (

)} {!isLoading && !isError && (

)}
) } function SidebarLink({ to, label, icon, active, disabled }) { const baseStyle = { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 12, padding: '10px 12px', borderRadius: 14, fontSize: 14, fontWeight: 600, color: '#e2e8f0', opacity: disabled ? 0.5 : 1, background: active ? palette.sidebarAccent : 'transparent', pointerEvents: disabled ? 'none' : 'auto', textDecoration: 'none', transition: 'background 0.2s ease', } if (disabled) { return ( {label} ) } if (active) { return ( {label} ) } return ( {label} ) } function ABCStatCard({ title, value, caption }) { return (
{title}
{value}

{caption}

) } function ABCBucketCard({ bucket, stats, color }) { const labels = { A: 'Alta rotacin', B: 'Rotacin media', C: 'Rotacin baja', } const description = { A: 'Priorizar control y abastecimiento constante. Representan el 20% de SKUs.', B: 'Monitoreo peridico. Cubren demanda intermedia.', C: 'Movimiento escaso. Evaluar depuracin o promociones.', } return (
{bucket} {labels[bucket]}
SKUs
{formatNumber(stats.count)}
Movimientos
{formatNumber(stats.movements)}

{description[bucket]}

) }

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [addNotification]

messages.message: The 'categorias' logical expression could make the dependencies of useMemo Hook (at line 58) change on every render. Move it inside the useMemo callback. Alternatively, wrap the initialization of 'categorias' in its own useMemo() Hook.

The 'proveedores' logical expression could make the dependencies of useMemo Hook (at line 69) change on every render. Move it inside the useMemo callback. Alternatively, wrap the initialization of 'proveedores' in its own useMemo() Hook.
This rule can't verify that `export *` only exports components.
